TextLibrary.Text: Red-Axe
It is time for your final lesson.
It is time for your final lesson.
It is time for your final lesson.
It is time for your final lesson.
Okay. What do I fight this time?
Okay. What do I fight this time?
Okay. What do I fight this time?
Okay. What do I fight this time?
Not 'what', but 'who'. You must take all the lessons you have learned and use them to fight me.
Not 'what', but 'who'. You must take all the lessons you have learned and use them to fight me.
Not 'what', but 'who'. You must take all the lessons you have learned and use them to fight me.
Not 'what', but 'who'. You must take all the lessons you have learned and use them to fight me.
Not to the...
Not to the...
Not to the...
Not to the...
No, not to the death. It is only a challenge. I will take it easy on you.
No, not to the death. It is only a challenge. I will take it easy on you.
No, not to the death. It is only a challenge. I will take it easy on you.
No, not to the death. It is only a challenge. I will take it easy on you.
You think I'm ready?
You think I'm ready?
You think I'm ready?
You think I'm ready?
I merely wish to see how much you have learned.
I merely wish to see how much you have learned.
I merely wish to see how much you have learned.
I merely wish to see how much you have learned.
What do I get if I win?
What do I get if I win?
What do I get if I win?
What do I get if I win?
Ha! You cannot win. If you beat me, I will give you my Axe, but that will never happen.
Ha! You cannot win. If you beat me, I will give you my Axe, but that will never happen.
Ha! You cannot win. If you beat me, I will give you my Axe, but that will never happen.
